channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Verse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Verse

item.title: CVE-2023-28013|2024-08-02T12:23:30.798Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20verse
item.description: HCL Verse is susceptible to a Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. By tricking a user into entering crafted markup a remote, unauthenticated attacker could execute script in a victim's web browser to perform operations as the victim and/or steal the victim's cookies, session tokens, or other sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-37496|2024-08-02T17:16:30.290Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20verse
item.description: HCL Verse is susceptible to a Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker could execute script in a victim's web browser to perform operations as the victim and/or steal the victim's cookies, session tokens, or other sensitive information.
